onboarding.title: 設定錢包
onboarding.sync_desc: 如果您已有 MetaMask 擴展程式或其它錢包，請將其同步或導入以便管理您的現有資產。
onboarding.create_desc: 設定您的第一個錢包，並開始探索去中心化應用。
onboarding.import: 導入現有錢包或建立新錢包
onboarding.optin_back_desc: 請同意或不同意使用資料分析。您也可以在設定中更新此選項。
onboarding.warning_text_1: 如果繼續，將刪除您當前的
onboarding.warning_text_4: 您只能使用錢包的助記詞恢復它們。MetaMask 無法幫助您恢復。
onboarding.sync_existing: 從瀏覽器擴展程式同步您的現有 MetaMask 錢包或手動導入錢包。
onboarding.scan_title: 與 MetaMask 擴展程式同步步驟
onboarding.scan_step_1: 在桌面上打開擴展程式

onboarding_carousel.title3: 您通往 web3 的大門
onboarding_carousel.subtitle1: MetaMask 深受數百萬人信任，是一款可以讓所有人進入 web3 世界的安全錢包。
onboarding_carousel.subtitle2: 存儲、支出和發送數位資產，如代幣、乙太幣、獨特收藏品。
onboarding_carousel.subtitle3: 使用 MetaMask 登入並進行交易，以便投資、賺錢、玩遊戲、銷售等！

step1.title: 歡迎使用您的新錢包！
step1.content1: 要使用區塊鏈，您需要一個錢包！有些操作可能需要花費乙太幣 (ETH)。
step1.content2: 我們將為您演示如何購買 ETH，或者，您可以向朋友索要一些。

step2.title: 您的帳戶
step2.content1: 這是您的第一個帳戶、總價值及其唯一公共位址 (0x...)。
step2.content2: 通過點按個人資料圖示，您可以在此錢包內建立多個帳戶。

step3.title: 編輯帳戶名
step3.content1: 為什麼不給您的帳戶起一個好記又獨特的名字呢？

step4.title: 主導航
step4.content2: 可訪問您的錢包、瀏覽器和交易歷史記錄。
step4.content3: 您可以對帳戶執行更多操作及訪問 MetaMask 設定。

step5.title: 探索瀏覽器
step5.content1: 您可以使用瀏覽器探索 web3

step6.title: 搜尋
step6.content: 搜尋網站；如果您知道要前往的目的地，鍵入 URL。

create_wallet.title: 正在建立您的錢包...
create_wallet.subtitle: 這應該不需要很長時間

import_wallet.title: 已經是 MetaMask 用戶？
import_wallet.sync_help: 與擴展程式同步您的錢包
import_wallet.sync_from_browser_extension_button: 與 MetaMask 擴展程式同步

login.title: 歡迎回來！
login.cant_proceed: 在輸入“Delete”單字之前，您無法繼續。通過此操作，您將會選擇刪除您現在的錢包。
login.type_delete: 輸入 ‘%{delete}’ 永久刪除當前錢包
login.are_you_sure: 您確定要清空您的錢包嗎?
login.your_current_wallet: 您當前的錢包、帳戶和資產將
login.removed_from: 從此應用程式中永久刪除.
login.metamask_does_not: MetaMask 沒有您的秘密恢復短語助記詞.
login.vault_error: Error: Cannot unlock without a previous vault.
login.clean_vault_error: MetaMask 由於達到存儲限制而遇到錯誤。本地數據已損壞。請重新安裝 MetaMask 並使用您的 Secret Recovery Phrase 秘密恢復短語助記詞 進行恢復.

enter_password.title: 輸入您的密碼
enter_password.desc: 請輸入您的密碼以便繼續

choose_password.title: 建立密碼
choose_password.subtitle: 此密碼將僅在此設備上解鎖您的 MetaMask 錢包。
choose_password.password_length_error: 密碼至少需要 8 個字元
choose_password.must_be_at_least: 必須至少包含 {{number}} 個字元
choose_password.security_alert_message: 若要繼續，您需要開啟密碼或設備上支援的任何生物特徵身份驗證方法（FaceID、TouchID 或指紋）
choose_password.i_understand: 我瞭解 MetaMask 無法為我找回此密碼。
choose_password.disable_biometric_error: 您已停用本應用的生物識別功能。更新與記住我的設定並重試。

reset_password.title: 更改密碼
reset_password.subtitle: 此密碼將僅在此設備上解鎖您的 MetaMask 錢包。
reset_password.password_length_error: 密碼至少需要 8 個字元
reset_password.must_be_at_least: 必須至少包含 {{number}} 個字元
reset_password.security_alert_message: 若要繼續，您需要開啟密碼或設備上支援的任何生物特徵身份驗證方法（FaceID、TouchID 或指紋）
reset_password.i_understand: 我瞭解 MetaMask 無法為我找回此密碼。

import_from_seed.title: 從助記詞導入
import_from_seed.password_length_error: 密碼至少需要 8 個字元
import_from_seed.seed_phrase_requirements: 助記詞包含 12、15、18、21 或 24 個字詞
import_from_seed.invalid_qr_code_message: 此二維碼不代表有效的助記詞

drawer.submit_feedback_message: 選擇要發送的回饋類型。

wallet.title: 錢包
wallet.no_collectibles: 您沒有任何收藏品 NFT！
wallet.token_removal_issue_desc: There was a problem when trying to remove the token. Try again.
wallet.token_removed_desc: 如果您改變主意，可以點按“+ 加入代幣”重新加入。
wallet.collectible_removed_desc: 如果您改變主意，可以點按“+ 加入收藏品”重新加入。
wallet.logout_to_import_seed: 您需要先登出，然後才能導入助記詞。
wallet.ready_to_explore: 準備開始探索區塊鏈應用？

add_asset.title: 加入資產
add_asset.warning_body_description: Anyone can create a token, including creating fake versions of existing tokens. Learn more about
add_asset.token_detection_feature: New! Improved token detection is available on Ethereum Mainnet as an experimental feature.

terms_and_conditions.title: 服務約定條款
terms_and_conditions.description: 繼續即表示您同意這些

privacy_policy.title: 隱私政策
privacy_policy.description: 為滿足歐盟第 2016/679 號條例《通用資料保護條例》的要求，此資料經過了聚合處理，因而成為匿名資料。有關我們的隱私保護操作的詳細資訊，請參閱我們的隱私政策
privacy_policy.description_content_1: MetaMask 希望收集基本的使用資料，以便更好地瞭解我們的用戶如何與移動應用交互。這些資料將用於持續改進我們產品的可用性和使用者體驗。
privacy_policy.action_description_1: 始終允許您通過“設定”選擇退出
privacy_policy.action_description_2: 發送匿名化點擊和頁面瀏覽事件
privacy_policy.action_description_4: 決不收集金鑰、位址、交易、餘額、雜湊或任何個人資訊
privacy_policy.action_description_5: 決不收集您的 IP 地址
privacy_policy.action_description_6: 決不出售資料牟利。絕對不會！

token.address_must_be_valid: 代幣位址必須是有效位址。
token.decimals_cant_be_empty: 代幣小數位數不能為空。
token.no_tokens_found: 我們無法找到具有該名稱的任何代幣。
token.address_must_be_smart_contract: 偵測到個人地址。輸入代幣合約位址。

collectible.address_must_be_valid: 收藏品位址必須是有效位址。
collectible.address_must_be_smart_contract: 偵測到個人地址。輸入收藏品合約位址。
collectible.token_id_cant_be_empty: 收藏品識別字不能為空。
collectible.not_owner_error: 您不是此收藏品的所有者，因此不能加入它。
collectible.ownership_verification_error: We could not verify ownership. This may be because the standard is not supported or the asset does not exist on your selected network.

accounts.remove_account_message: 是否確實想要刪除此帳戶？

app_settings.title: 設定
app_settings.ipfs_gateway_down: 您當前的 IPFS 閘道發生故障
app_settings.ipfs_gateway_desc: 選擇您的首選 IPFS 閘道。
app_settings.auto_lock_desc: 選擇應用程式自動鎖定之前空閒的時間。
app_settings.state_logs_desc: 這將幫助 MetaMask 調試您可能遇到的任何問題。請通過電子郵件將其發送到 support@metamask.io
app_settings.instapay_state_logs_desc: 這將幫助 MetaMask 調試 InstaPay 的問題。請通過電子郵件將其發送到 support@metamask.io
app_settings.clear_approvals_modal_message: 所有去中心化應用都將需要再次請求查看帳戶資訊的存取權限。
app_settings.clear_browser_history_modal_message: 我們即將刪除您的所有瀏覽器歷史記錄。您確定嗎？
app_settings.clear_cookies_modal_message: 我們即將刪除您的瀏覽器 Cookie。您確定嗎？
app_settings.reset_account_modal_message: 重置帳戶將清除您的交易歷史記錄。
app_settings.invalid_rpc_prefix: URI 需要適當的 HTTPS 首碼
app_settings.sync_with_extension: 與 MetaMask 擴展程式同步
app_settings.sync_with_extension_desc: 這會將所有擴展程式帳戶導入此設備。
app_settings.clear_approved_dapps: 清除已批准的去中心化應用
app_settings.clear_approve_dapps_desc: 清除已批准的去中心化應用
app_settings.protect_desc: 為了保護您的錢包，請將助記詞保存在不同的地點，如紙上、密碼管理器中和/或雲端。
app_settings.privacy_mode_desc: 網站必須請求查看您的帳戶資訊的存取權限。
app_settings.show_hex_data_desc: 選擇此項可在發送螢幕上顯示十六進位資料欄位。
app_settings.custom_nonce_desc: 打開此選項以更改確認螢幕上的隨機數（交易編號）。這是一項高級功能，請謹慎使用.
app_settings.accounts_identicon_desc: 雜湊頭像是幫助您一眼識別帳戶的獨特圖示，有 Jazzicons 和 Blockies 兩種不同風格。
app_settings.general_desc: 貨幣轉換、主要貨幣、語言和搜尋引擎
app_settings.advanced_desc: 訪問開發人員功能、重置帳戶、設定測試網、與擴展程式同步、狀態日誌、IPFS 閘道和自訂 RPC
app_settings.contacts_desc: 加入、編輯、刪除和管理您的帳戶
app_settings.security_desc: 隱私設定、MetaMetrics、私密金鑰和錢包助記詞
app_settings.networks_desc: 加入並編輯自訂 RPC 網路
app_settings.conversion_desc: 在整個應用程式中使用特定貨幣顯示法幣價值。
app_settings.primary_currency_desc: 選擇“原生”可優先以鏈的原生貨幣（如 ETH）顯示值。選擇“法幣”可優先以您選定的法幣顯示值。
app_settings.language_desc: 將應用程式翻譯成其它受支援的語言。
app_settings.engine_desc: 更改在 URL 欄中輸入搜尋詞時所使用的默認搜尋引擎。
app_settings.reset_desc: 此操作將清除您的交易歷史記錄。這些資料可能無法恢復。
app_settings.rpc_desc: 通過 URL 使用支援自訂 RPC 的網路，而不是所提供的網路之一。
app_settings.hex_desc: 選擇此項可在發送螢幕上顯示十六進位資料欄位。
app_settings.clear_privacy_desc: 清除隱私資料，以便所有網站必須再次請求查看帳戶資訊的存取權限。
app_settings.clear_history_desc: 選擇此選項可清除您的整個瀏覽歷史記錄。
app_settings.clear_cookies_desc: 選擇此選項可清除您的瀏覽器的 Cookie。
app_settings.metametrics_description: 參加 MetaMetrics 以幫助我們改進 MetaMask。
app_settings.third_party_description: 協力廠商 API (Etherscan) 用於顯示歷史記錄中的傳入交易。如果您不希望我們通過這些服務拉取資料，請關閉。
app_settings.metametrics_restart_required: 您需要重啟應用才能使更改生效。
app_settings.failed_to_fetch_chain_id: Could not fetch chain ID. Is your RPC URL correct?
app_settings.endpoint_returned_different_chain_id: The endpoint returned a different chain ID: %{chainIdReturned}
app_settings.chain_id_required: The chain ID is required. It must match the chain ID returned by the network. You can enter a decimal or '0x'-prefixed hexadecimal number.
app_settings.invalid_hex_number_leading_zeros: Invalid hexadecimal number. Remove any leading zeros.
app_settings.invalid_number: Invalid number. Enter a decimal or '0x'-prefixed hexadecimal number.
app_settings.invalid_number_leading_zeros: Invalid number. Remove any leading zeros.
app_settings.invalid_number_range: Invalid number. Enter a number between 1 and %{maxSafeChainId}
app_settings.hide_zero_balance_tokens_desc: Prevents tokens with no balance from displaying in your token listing.
app_settings.token_detection_description: We use third-party APIs to detect and display new tokens sent to your wallet. Turn off if you don’t want the app to pull data from those services.

reveal_credential.seed_phrase_explanation: 如果更改瀏覽器或移動電腦，您將需要此助記詞才能訪問帳戶。將它們保存在安全、秘密的地方。
reveal_credential.private_key_explanation: 將它保存在安全、秘密的地方。
reveal_credential.private_key_warning: 這是當前選定帳戶的私密金鑰：{{accountName}}。請勿洩露此金鑰。任何得到您的私密金鑰的人都可以完全控制您的帳戶，包括轉走所有資金。
reveal_credential.seed_phrase_warning_explanation: 請勿將此助記詞告訴任何人！這些字詞可用於竊取您的所有帳戶。
reveal_credential.private_key_warning_explanation: 請勿洩露此金鑰。任何得到您的私密金鑰的人都可以完全控制您的帳戶，包括轉走所有資金。
reveal_credential.seed_phrase_copied: 助記詞已複製到剪貼板
reveal_credential.private_key_copied: 私密金鑰已複製到剪貼板
reveal_credential.unknown_error: 無法解鎖您的帳戶。請重試。
reveal_credential.seed_warning: 這是您的錢包的 12 字助記詞。此助記詞可用來控制您當前和未來的所有帳戶，還能夠轉走其中的所有資金。請妥善保管此助記詞，不要告訴任何人。

password_reset.password_desc: 選擇一個強式密碼來解鎖您設備上的 MetaMask 應用。如果丟失密碼，您將需要助記詞來重新導入錢包。

account_details.title: 帳戶詳細資訊
account_details.view_account: 在 Etherscan 上查看帳戶
account_details.account_copied_to_clipboard: 公共地址已複製到剪貼板

qr_scanner.invalid_qr_code_message: 您嘗試掃描的二維碼無效。
qr_scanner.allow_camera_dialog_message: 我們需要您的許可才能掃描二維碼
qr_scanner.attempting_to_scan_with_wallet_locked: Looks like you're trying to scan a QR code, you need to unlock your wallet to be able to use it.
qr_scanner.attempting_sync_from_wallet_error: 好像您正嘗試與擴展程式同步。要進行同步，請轉至“設定”>“進階”>“與 MetaMask 擴展程式同步”

transaction.this_is_an_advanced: This is an advanced feature used to cancel or speed up any pending transactions.
transaction.think_of_the_nonce: Think of the nonce as the transaction number of an account. Every account's nonce begins with 0 for the first transaction and continues in sequential order.
transaction.nonce_warning: Warning: You may encounter issues with future transactions if you continue. Use with caution.
transaction.high_gas_price: Your gas fee may be set unnecessarily high ({{currentGasPrice}}). Consider lowering the amount.
transaction.invalid_collectible_ownership: 您並不是此收藏品的所有者
transaction.no_address_for_ens: 無 ENS 名稱的地址
transaction.approve_warning: 批准此操作，即表示您准許此合約最多支出
transaction.cancel_tx_message: 提交此嘗試不能保證將會取消您的初始交易。如果取消嘗試成功，將向您收取以上交易費。
transaction.speedup_tx_message: 提交此嘗試不能保證將會加速您的初始交易。如果加速嘗試成功，將向您收取以上交易費。
transaction.not_enough_for_gas: 您的帳戶中有 0 {{ticker}} 可用于支付交易費。購買一些 {{ticker}} 或從其它帳戶存入。
transaction.tokenContractAddressWarning_3: .如果將代幣發送到此地址，您將失去代幣。
transaction.smartContractAddressWarning: 此地址是智能合約地址。請確保您瞭解此地址的用途，否則您將面臨資金損失風險。
transaction.gas_education_1: Gas fees are paid to crypto miners who process transactions on the
transaction.gas_education_3: MetaMask does not profit from gas fees.
transaction.gas_education_4: Gas fees fluctuate based on network traffic and transaction complexitity.
transaction.confusable_msg: We have detected a confusable character in the ENS name. Check the ENS name to avoid a potential scam.
transaction.dapp_suggested_gas: This gas fee has been suggested by %{origin}. It’s using legacy gas estimation which may be inaccurate. However, editing this gas fee may cause a problem with your transaction. Please reach out to %{origin} if you have questions.
transaction.dapp_suggested_eip1559_gas: This gas fee has been suggested by %{origin}. Overriding this may cause a problem with your transaction. Please reach out to %{origin} if you have questions.

custom_gas.warning_gas_limit: Gas 限額必須大於 20999、小於 7920027
custom_gas.warning_gas_limit_estimated: Estimated gas limit is {{gas}}, use it as minimum value
custom_gas.cost_explanation: 選擇您願意支付的網路費。費用越高，您的交易得到處理的幾率越大、速度越快。

spend_limit_edition.title: 編輯許可權
spend_limit_edition.allow_explanation: 最高提取和支付以下數額：
spend_limit_edition.you_trust_this_site: 您是否信任此網站？授予此許可權，即表示您允許此網站訪問您的資金。
spend_limit_edition.you_trust_this_address: 您是否信任此地址？授予此許可權，即表示您允許此位址訪問您的資金。
spend_limit_edition.transaction_fee_explanation: 交易費與此許可權關聯。
spend_limit_edition.details_explanation: {{host}} 最多可從該帳戶訪問並支付此最大數額。
spend_limit_edition.all_set_desc: 您已成功為此網站設定許可權。

browser.title: 瀏覽器
browser.dapp_browser_message: MetaMask 是您的錢包和去中心化網路瀏覽器。隨便看看！
browser.no_tabs_desc: 要瀏覽去中心化網路，請加入新標籤頁
browser.failed_to_resolve_ens_name: 我們無法解析該 ENS 名稱
browser.remove_bookmark_msg: 是否確實想要從您的我的最愛中刪除此網站？

transactions.hash_copied_to_clipboard: 交易雜湊已複製到剪貼板
transactions.address_to_placeholder: 搜尋、公共地址 (0x) 或 ENS
transactions.import_wallet_tip: All future transactions made from this device will include a label "from this device" next to the timestamp. For transactions dated before adding the account, this history will not indicate which outgoing transactions originated from this device.

address_book.add_this_address: 將此地址加入至您的通訊錄。
address_book.name: 名稱

sync_with_extension.title: 從擴展程式同步資料
sync_with_extension.label: 在您的桌面瀏覽器中打開 MetaMask 擴展程式，然後轉至“設定”>“進階”，按一下“與手機同步”，然後輸入您的密碼以查看二維碼
sync_with_extension.please_wait: 請稍候，我們正在同步您的資料...
sync_with_extension.warning_message: 這將覆蓋您手機裡的所有當前帳戶和交易歷史記錄。您確定嗎？
sync_with_extension.invalid_qr_code_desc: 這不是正確的二維碼！要與瀏覽器擴展程式同步，請轉至瀏覽器擴展程式中的“設定”>“進階”>“與手機同步”，然後掃描其中的二維碼
sync_with_extension.outdated_qr_code_desc: 好像這是已過期的二維碼！請嘗試掃描新二維碼
sync_with_extension.something_wrong_desc: 我們在嘗試與您的錢包同步時遇到問題。請稍後重試或使用助記詞導入您的錢包
sync_with_extension.allow_biometrics_desc: 您可以使用 {{biometrics}} 在 MetaMask 上進行身份驗證

sync_with_extension_success.title: 已導入錢包
sync_with_extension_success.sync_complete_1: 切記，如果您丟失助記詞，MetaMask 無法幫助您找回。您可以在以下位置找到助記詞：
sync_with_extension_success.password_tip: 用於解鎖移動錢包的密碼與您為擴展程式設定的密碼相同。

accountApproval.title: 連接請求
accountApproval.warning: 按一下“連接”即表示您允許此去中心化應用查看您的公共地址。這是保護您的資料防範網路釣魚風險的重要安全步驟。

import_private_key.title: 導入帳戶
import_private_key.description_one: 導入的帳戶可在您的錢包中查看，但無法通過 MetaMask 助記詞找回。
import_private_key.learn_more_here: 在此處詳細瞭解導入的帳戶。

import_private_key_success.title: 帳戶導入成功！
import_private_key_success.description_one: 您現在將能夠在 MetaMask 中查看您的帳戶。

secure_your_wallet.title: 保護您的錢包安全
secure_your_wallet.info_text_1: 用幾分鐘時間完成 MetaMask 錢包的設定。
secure_your_wallet.info_text_2: 這將確保只有您才可以訪問自己的資金，還可以在丟失設備時找回自己的錢包

account_backup_step_1.title: 保護您的錢包安全
account_backup_step_1.info_text_1_1: 不要冒丟失資金的風險。在信任的地點保存您的
account_backup_step_1.info_text_1_4: 如果您被應用鎖定或換新設備，這是找回錢包的唯一途徑。
account_backup_step_1.skip_check: 我瞭解丟失助記詞後將無法訪問錢包。
account_backup_step_1.what_is_seedphrase_title: 什麼是“秘密恢復短語 助記詞”
account_backup_step_1.what_is_seedphrase_text_1: 助記詞是一組 12 個字詞，包含與您的錢包相關的所有資訊，包括您的資金。它像是用來訪問整個錢包的一組密碼。
account_backup_step_1.what_is_seedphrase_text_2: 您必須確保助記詞保密、安全。如果有人得到您的助記詞，他們將能夠控制您的帳戶。
account_backup_step_1.what_is_seedphrase_text_3: 將它保存在只有您能夠接觸的地方。一旦丟失，即使是 MetaMask 也無法幫您找回。

account_backup_step_1B.title: 保護您的錢包安全
account_backup_step_1B.manual_subtitle: 在一張紙上寫下您的助記詞並將其存放在安全的地方。
account_backup_step_1B.why_secure_1: 不要冒丟失資金的風險。在信任的地點保存您的助記詞，以此保護您的錢包。
account_backup_step_1B.why_secure_2: 如果您被應用鎖定或換新設備，這是找回錢包的唯一途徑。

account_backup_step_2.cancel_backup_message: 我們強烈建議您保存助記詞，以便恢復錢包。
account_backup_step_2.title: 拿起筆和紙
account_backup_step_2.info: 下一步是寫下您的助記詞。

account_backup_step_3.cancel_backup_message: 我們強烈建議您保存助記詞，以便恢復錢包。
account_backup_step_3.title: 有人在看嗎？
account_backup_step_3.info_text: 確保其它人或機器人沒有看您的螢幕。如果有人複製您的助記詞，可能會在其它設備上竊取您的資金

account_backup_step_4.cancel_backup_message: 我們強烈建議您保存助記詞，以便恢復錢包。
account_backup_step_4.title: 您的助記詞
account_backup_step_4.info_text_1: 在紙上認真記下這些字詞。它們的順序十分重要。
account_backup_step_4.info_text_2: 您將需要在下一螢幕上重新輸入
account_backup_step_4.before_continiuing: 在繼續之前，我們需要您確認自己的密碼

account_backup_step_5.error_message: 字詞的順序不正確。請確保您在紙上的記錄正確無誤，需要的話可以返回上一螢幕
account_backup_step_5.title: 確認助記詞
account_backup_step_5.info_text: 按照前一螢幕上呈現的順序插入每個字詞。
account_backup_step_5.modal_text: 這是為了確保您遵守該安全措施

account_backup_step_6.title: 安全提示
account_backup_step_6.info_text: 如果您丟失助記詞，MetaMask 無法找回
account_backup_step_6.tip_1: 為助記詞保留多個備份
account_backup_step_6.tip_2: 在信任的密碼管理器中保存助記詞，並在安全的地方存放紙質備份
account_backup_step_6.tip_3: 切勿將此助記詞告訴他人
account_backup_step_6.disclaimer: * 您可以在以下位置找到助記詞：
account_backup_step_6.modal_text: 您已完全備份，整裝待發！
account_backup_step_6.copy_seed_phrase: 將助記詞複製到剪貼板

manual_backup_step_1.info: 這是您的助記詞。將它寫在紙上並存放在安全的地方。您將需要在下一步中重新輸入此助記詞（按順序）。
manual_backup_step_1.watching: 確保沒有人在看您的螢幕。
manual_backup_step_1.before_continiuing: 在繼續之前，我們需要您確認自己的密碼

manual_backup_step_2.info: 按照之前呈現的順序選擇每個字詞。

manual_backup_step_3.success: 您已成功保護自己的錢包。記住妥善保管您的助記詞，這是您的責任！
manual_backup_step_3.recover: 如果您丟失助記詞，MetaMask 無法找回您的錢包。您可在“設定”>“安全和隱私”中找到助記詞。
manual_backup_step_3.leave_hint: 給自己留下提示。寫下您的保存位置，提醒自己如何找到它。這些資訊不會離開您的設備。
manual_backup_step_3.no_seedphrase: 不要在這裡寫您的助記詞。

phishing.ethereum_phishing_detector: 乙太坊網路釣魚偵測器
phishing.intro: 當前在 MetaMask 域警告列表中。這意味著根據我們可用的資訊，MetaMask 認為此域當前可能會損害您的安全，因此，作為一項額外的安全功能，MetaMask 已限制訪問此網站。要忽略此提醒，請閱讀此警告的剩餘部分，瞭解關於如何自負風險繼續的說明。
phishing.reasons: 網站出現在我們的警告列表中有很多原因，而且我們的警告清單是根據其它廣泛使用的行業列表編制的。這些原因可能包括已知欺詐或安全風險，如測試結果為陽性的域
phishing.list_content: 這些警告列表中的域可能包括完全惡意的網站以及被惡意行為者破壞的合法網站。
phishing.to_read_more: 要閱讀此網站的更多資訊，
phishing.review_on_etherscam: 請在 Etherscam 上查看該域。
phishing.warning: 注意，此警告列表是在自願基礎上編制的。此列表可能不準確或不完整。單憑域未出現在此列表中，並不是該域安全的隱性擔保。一如既往，您的交易由您自己負責。如果您希望與我們警告列表中的任何域交互，您可以自負風險
phishing.file_an_issue_intro: 如果您認為此域標記錯誤，或者被攔截的合法網站已解決其安全問題，

notifications.success_withdrawal_message: 您的資金已轉移到您的錢包

notifications.purchase_pending_title: 正在處理您的 {{currency}} 購買

step_1.title: Before you purchase ETH, understand gas fees
step_1.subtitle_1: If you plan to swap or transfer your ETH, purchase extra to cover gas fees.
step_1.subtitle_2: Gas fees for transactions are separate from the cost of purchasing ETH.
step_1.subtitle_3: MetaMask does not profit from gas fees.

step_2.title: What are gas fees?
step_2.subtitle_1: Gas powers transactions on the Ethereum network. It’s a fee paid in ETH to the crypto miners who process your transactions.
step_2.subtitle_2: MetaMask does not profit from gas fees.

step_3.title: How much do I need?
step_3.subtitle_1: Gas fees fluctuate based on network traffic and type of transaction.
step_3.subtitle_2: A complex transaction like “swapping” may cost 5x - 10x more than a “send” transaction.
step_3.subtitle_3: The best way to estimate gas fees is to
step_3.subtitle_5: and see how much gas costs.

swaps.feature_off_body: MetaMask Swaps is undergoing maintenance. Please check back later.
swaps.wrong_network_body: You’re only able to swap tokens on the Ethereum Main Network.
swaps.unallowed_asset_body: Some tokens with unique mechanics are currently not supported for swapping.
swaps.verify_on: Always verify the token address on
swaps.added_manually: This token has been added manually.
swaps.make_sure_trade: and make sure this is the token you want to trade.
swaps.token_multiple: Multiple tokens can use the same name and symbol.
swaps.token_to_verify: to verify this is the token you're looking for.
swaps.manually_pasting: Manually add a token by pasting its address.
swaps.token_address_can_be_found: Token contract addresses can be found on
swaps.error_gathering_token_details: Oops, there was an error gathering token details.
swaps.add_warning: Anyone can create a token, including creating fake versions of existing tokens that claim to represent projects.
swaps.not_enough: Not enough {{symbol}} to complete this swap
swaps.slippage_info: If the rate changes between the time your order is placed and confirmed it’s called “slippage”. Your Swap will automatically cancel if slippage exceeds your “max slippage” setting.
swaps.slippage_warning: Make sure you know what you’re doing!
swaps.more_gas_to_complete: more for gas to complete this swap.
swaps.market_price_unavailable: Market price is unavailable and price impact is therefore unknown. Please verify that you are comfortable with the amount of tokens you will receive before swapping.
swaps.price_difference_body: The difference in market prices can be affected by fees taken by intermediaries, size of market, size of trade, or market inefficiencies.
swaps.price_impact_body: Price impact is the difference between the current market price and the amount received during transaction execution. Price impact is a function of the size of your trade relative to the size of the liquidity pool.
swaps.quotes_update_often_text: Quotes are updated often to reflect current market conditions.

fee_text.fee_is_applied: A fee of {{fee}} is automatically factored into each quote, which supports ongoing development to make MetaMask even better.

quote_source_dex.1: This quote comes directly from a

quote_source_rfq.3: who responds with a quote directly.

quote_source_agg.3: which finds the best price by splitting your order between different decentralized exchanges.

quote_source_cnt.1: This quote comes directly from a
quote_source_cnt.3: that wraps and unwraps native tokens which can save on gas costs.

swaps.request_new_quotes: Please request new quotes to get the latest best rate.
swaps.try_adjusting: Try adjusting the amount and try again.
swaps.unexpected_error: There has been an unexpected error, please request new quotes to get the latest best rate. (error: {{error}})
swaps.medium_selected_warning: Swaps are time sensitive. “Medium” is not reccomended.
swaps.high_recommendation: Swaps are typically time sensitive. “High” will help avoid potential losses due to changes in market conditions.
swaps.gas_education_1: Gas fees are paid to crypto miners who process transactions on the
swaps.gas_education_3: MetaMask does not profit from gas fees.
swaps.gas_education_6: is what we expect the actual fee to be. The exact amount depends on network conditions.
swaps.gas_education_8: is the most you’ll spend. When the network is volatile this can be a large amount.

protect_wallet_modal.text_bold: 如果您被應用鎖定或換新設備，這是找回錢包的唯一途徑。

error_screen.submit_ticket_1: 請報告此問題，以便我們能夠修復它：
error_screen.submit_ticket_7: 請包含錯誤消息和螢幕截圖。
error_screen.save_seedphrase_3: 並重新安裝應用。注：沒有助記詞將無法恢復錢包。

invalid_network.hint: You can find the chain IDs of most popular networks on

switch_custom_network.title_existing_network: This site would like to switch the network
switch_custom_network.switch_warning: This will switch the selected network within MetaMask to a prevously added network:
switch_custom_network.available: is now available in the network selector.

add_custom_network.title: Allow this site to add a network?
add_custom_network.warning: This allows this network to be used within MetaMask.
add_custom_network.warning_subtext_1: MetaMask does not verify custom networks or their security.
add_custom_network.unrecognized_chain: This custom network is not recongized
add_custom_network.invalid_chain: The %{rpcUrl} for this Chain ID does not match the chainid.network listing

edit_gas_fee_eip1559.swaps_warning: Swaps are very time sensitive. “High” will help avoid potential loses due to changes in market conditions.
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.priority_fee_at_least_0_error: Priority fee must be at least 1 GWEI

learn_more.title: How should I choose?
learn_more.intro: Selecting the right gas fee depends on the type of transaction and how important it is to you.
learn_more.high_text: This is best for time sensitive transactions (like Swaps) as it increases the likelihood of a successful transaction. If a Swap takes too long to process it may fail and result in losing some of your gas fee.
learn_more.medium_text: A medium gas fee is good for sending, withdrawing or other non-time sensitive transactions. This setting will most often result in a successful transaction.
learn_more.low_text: A low gas fee should only be used for unimportant transactions or when network traffic is very low. With a lower fee it can be hard to predict when (or if) your transaction will be successful.

edit_gas_fee_eip1559.max_priority_fee_low: Max Priority Fee is low for current network conditions
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.max_priority_fee_high: Max Priority Fee is higher than necessary
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.max_priority_fee_speed_up_low: Max Priority Fee must be at least {{speed_up_floor_value}} GWEI (10% higher than intial transaction)
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.max_priority_fee_cancel_low: Max Priority Fee must be at least {{cancel_value}} GWEI (50% higher than intial transaction)
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.max_fee_low: Max Fee is low for current network conditions
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.max_fee_high: Max Fee is higher than necessary
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.max_fee_speed_up_low: Max Fee must be at least {{speed_up_floor_value}} GWEI (10% higher than intial transaction)
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.max_fee_cancel_low: Max Fee must be at least {{cancel_value}} GWEI (50% higher than intial transaction)
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.learn_more_gas_limit: Gas limit is the maximum units of gas you are willing to use. Units of gas are a multiplier to “Max priority fee” and “Max fee”.
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.learn_more_max_priority_fee: Max priority fee (aka “miner tip”) goes directly to miners and incentivizes them to prioritize your transaction. You’ll most often pay your max setting.
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.learn_more_max_fee: The max fee is the most you’ll pay (base fee + priority fee).
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.learn_more_new_gas_fee: We have updated the gas fee based on current network conditions and have increased it by at least 10% (required by the network).
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.learn_more_cancel_gas_fee: We have updated the gas fee based on current network conditions and have increased it by at least 50% (required by the network).
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.learn_more_gas_limit_legacy: Gas limit is the maximum units of gas you are willing to use. Units of gas are a multiplier to “Gas price”.
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.learn_more_gas_price: This network requires a “Gas price” field when submitting a transaction. Gas price is the maximum amount you are willing to pay per unit of gas.
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.gas_price_low: Gas price is low for current network conditions
edit_gas_fee_eip1559.gas_price_high: Gas price is higher than necessary

transaction_review_eip1559.estimated_gas_fee_tooltip_text_1: Gas fees are paid to crypto miners who process transactions on the
transaction_review_eip1559.estimated_gas_fee_tooltip_text_4: MetaMask does not profit from gas fees.
transaction_review_eip1559.estimated_gas_fee_tooltip_text_5: Gas fees are set by the network and fluctuate based on network traffic and transaction complexity.
transaction_review_eip1559.legacy_gas_suggestion_tooltip: This gas fee suggestion is using legacy gas estimation which may be inaccurate.

times_eip1559.warning_unknown: Your max fee or max priority fee may be low for current market conditions. We don’t know when (or if) your transaction will be processed.
times_eip1559.warning_low: This lowers your maximum fee but if network traffic increases your transaction may be delayed or fail.

review_prompt.mobile_sentiment: How do you feel about MetaMask mobile?
